definition: Investiture of the Gods, major Ming dynasty vernacular novel of mythology and fantasy, very loosely based on King Wu of Zhou's 周武王[Zhou1 Wu3 wang2] overthrow of the Shang, subsequent material for opera, film, TV series, computer games etc
surname Feng
to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters

deity/soul/spirit/unusual/mysterious/lively/expressive/expression/look/CL:個|个[ge4]/(slang) awesome/amazing
variant of 榜[bang3]
notice or announcement/list of names/public roll of successful examinees

sentences.chinese: 封神榜是一款很受玩家欢迎的游戏。
